english.segment1: You came like the wind. Took me to a mountain. From a valley of sin. And my soul patiently waits. For I long to be near You
english.segment2: Jesus Savior. You changed the rhythm of my heart. And I will praise You. Long after the rivers all run dry
english.segment3: And I will love You forever
english.segment4: Long after the rivers all run dry. Long after the rivers all run dry. And I will love You forever
